Package se.kth.iv1350.retailStore.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
se.kth.iv1350.retailStore.controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Creates a new instance of the controller. Initializes the registry handler and a new cash register.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(RegistryHandler creator, FileLogger logger)
      Creates a new instance of the controller.
      Parameters:
      creator - The registry handler to be used for item registration and discount fetching.
      logger - The logger to be used for logging operations.

  • Method Details

    • newSale

      public void newSale()
      Starts a new sale by creating a new Sale object.

    • registerItem

      public ItemDTO registerItem(ItemDTO searchedItem) throws ItemHandlingException, DatabaseUnreachableException
      Registers an item by finding and adding it to the sale.
      Parameters:
      searchedItem - The item to be registered.
      Returns:
      The found item.
      Throws:
      ItemHandlingException - If the item is not found in the
      DatabaseUnreachableException - If the database is unreachable.

    • getSaleInfo

      public SaleDTO getSaleInfo()
      This method retrieves the sale information if available. It checks if the sale object is not null to avoid errors.
      Returns:
      SaleDTO containing sale information, or null if no sale information is available.

    • fetchDiscount

      public SaleDTO fetchDiscount(String customerId)
      Fetches the discount for a given customer and applies it to the sale.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The customer ID to fetch the discount for.
      Returns:
      The updated SaleDTO with the applied discount.

    • endSale

      public SaleDTO endSale()
      Ends the sale and prepares the SaleDTO for final processing.
      Returns:
      The final SaleDTO with all sale details.

    • payForSale

      public SaleDTO payForSale(AmountDTO amount)
      Processes the payment for the sale and updates the cash register and other registers. Prints the receipt after the payment is completed.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount paid by the customer.
      Returns:
      The SaleDTO with payment information.

    • addRevenueObserver

      public void addRevenueObserver(TotalRevenueObserver newObserver)
      Adds a new observer to the cash register to monitor revenue changes.
      Parameters:
      newObserver - The observer to be added.
